job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Role: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)An award winning Fortune 50 Energy Company, striving towards cleaner energy solutions, is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a contract to hire basis. The Site Reliability Engineer will be responsible for the upkeep and improvement of DSX production systems. The contract will be 6 - 12 months with the likelihood of becoming a full time role.Role/Responsibilities:Support Service EngineersUpkeep and improve existing infrastructure and documentationInfrastructure AutomationImprove upon Prometheus MonitoringDeploy new versions of DSXRequirements:3+ Years’ Experience in a similar role preferredBachelor’s DegreeFamiliarity with Linux, Unix Shell, GithubTools: Nginx, Docker, Kubernetes, or TerraformLanguages: Nodejs, Python, Go, .NET, or RubyCompensation and Benefits:The rate for this role is $70-95 p/h with some flexibility for exceptional circumstances. We also offer medical contributions (up to 75%) & 401k plans.*No C2C candidates*Must be eligible to work in TXCould this be of interest to you at this time? If so, please apply with an updated copy of your resume and feel free to follow-up with a call at 929-521-4926.
